events.message: I placed my order two weeks ago and my package still hasn't arrived. The tracking info hasn't updated in days and I'm worried about the delay.
The system has categorized the issue as Delivery Delay based on keywords related to late shipment and tracking not updating.
Your case has been assigned to our delivery support agent who will assist you with the shipment delay.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear your package is delayed. I’m here to help you track this order and resolve the issue as soon as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking details you have so I can investigate the shipment status for you?
Sure, my order number is 987654321 and the tracking number on the confirmation email is ZX123456789US, but it hasn't updated since last week.
Thank you for the info. We checked with the courier and it appears there’s a temporary delay in your delivery area. We expect your package to arrive within 3 business days.
Okay, thanks for the update. I'll wait a few more days but please keep me posted if anything changes.
Your package has been delivered today. Thank you for your patience while we resolved the delay.
Just following up to ensure your delivery arrived safely and that you are satisfied with the resolution of your shipment delay.
Since everything is resolved, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us and have a great day!
